experiences.description: Led the development of multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and modern cloud technologies. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated testing.
Developed responsive web applications and implemented modern UI/UX practices. Collaborated with designers to create pixel-perfect implementations.
